title: Multiboot DVD
description:
Multiboot DVD:
- Windows XP SP3 Unattended edition + Extra drivers SPANISH
- Reatogo XPE Boot CD SPANISH
- ERD Commander 2007
- Hiren\&#039;s Boot CD 9.5 (Spanish patched keyboard)
- Damn Small Linux
- Offline NT Password Changer
- Acronis Trueimage Echo Enterprise Server
- Acronis Disk Director Server
- PortableApps Large collection (1.6Gb)

This is the best Boot DVD I have ever made.
I have personally built the Win XP SP3 unattended edition using nLite and WindowsUE 7 programs (and adding lots of programs too), and the Reatogo XPE Boot CD using the Reatogo tools to build Windows XPE.


I hope you like it.
